title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Market Abuse)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Market Abuse) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (market abuse) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. The European Union (Market Abuse) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 349 of
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Market Abuse) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 349 of 
2016) are amended by the insertion of the following Regulation after 
Regulation 8: 

“Market abuse occurring partly in State 

8A. A person may be tried in the State for an offence under 
Regulation 5, 6 or 7 if any one or more of the acts alleged to 
constitute 
the State, 
notwithstanding that the other acts alleged to constitute the 
offence were committed outside the State.”. 

the offence were committed 

in 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 October, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ L 173, 12.6.2014, p. 1. 
2 OJ L 173, 12.6.2014, p. 179. 
3 OJ L 332, 18.12.2015, p. 126. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th October, 2023.
